mapper.insert: insert into tb_stat (meal_seq, user_seq, morning, lunch, diner, snack, meal_date) values (#{mealSeq}, #{userSeq}, #{morning}, #{lunch}, #{diner}, #{snack}, #{mealDate})
mapper.select: select * from tb_stat where user_seq = #{userSeq} and to_char(meal_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_char(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by meal_date
select * from tb_stat_exercise where to_char(exercise_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(#{exerciseDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
